description: Through manipulation of passwords or other variables, using commands such as portcfgupload, configupload, license, myid, a non-privileged user could obtain root privileges in Brocade Fabric OS versions before Brocade Fabric OS v9.1.1c and v9.2.0.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: before Brocade Fabric OS v9.1.1c and v9.2.0
